Title: Umbraco Single Item Picker+Multiple Items Picker
Description:
Extention to the Umbraco, needs to pick:
   - Content pages,
   - Media items,
   - File System Objects,
   - Member Items

in more "better way"
additionally control returns not only item name(title) but also extended information (path, icon).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Extention to the Umbraco, needs to pick:
- Content pages,
- Media items,
- File System Objects,
- Member Items

in more "better way"
additionally control returns not only item name(title) but also extended information (path, icon).

 

 

 

There is another picker, which needs to generate [List of child items -links etc].

Multiple items picker:

   - sorted (drag and drop+buttons)

   - editable

   - selected item will be selected in the picker

   - new item will start from specific node (predefined) and last element will be selected - more quicker way to fill data

 

 

 

documentation contains more information...
